item.title: MyWell
item.description: What is it MyWell is a Smartphone and SMS app for tracking water data. The app works by crowdsourcing well, rainfall and checkdam readings from a network of volunteers. MyWell displays the current status of each well, as well as historical and village level data for simple comparison and analysis. How it works Readings & Visualisation When a voluneteer takes a reading from a well, rainfall station or checkdam, they can use MyWell to submit it immediately.
